renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(z,u)                              \
    vec2 A=u-u,B=A,C=A, G, b = u/iResolution.y;     \
    B.x = 1.7; C.y++;                               \
    float a, k=.0,i=0.; \
    for(; i++ < 9. ; C = (b-G)/3., k *= 3. )  \
        a = dot( normalize(G = b-A-B), normalize(B+B-A) ), \
        A = a < -.5 ? A : (k++,B + C),    \
        B = a >  .5 ? k++, B : C;        \
    z = cos( iTime + k/vec4(9,7,5,1) )
renderpass.name: Image
